title: Сімейний консультант
overview: The protagonist, a psychologist who has a son with Asperger's syndrome, advises families with children suffering from various forms of autism spectrum disorder. Each episode is a separate story about the search for mutual understanding with a child whose world is very unusual and vulnerable. Such a "prism" reveals problems in the relationships of "normal" people. All the events take place in the midst of russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine.
